bill_title: establish the tobacco settlement trust fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish the tobacco settlement trust fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The tobacco settlement trust fund is established according to § 4-4-4. Any money received from the Master Settlement Agreement signed on November 23, 1998, by attorneys general from several states and various tobacco companies shall be deposited in the tobacco settlement trust fund. The principal in the trust fund may not be expended unless the total settlement received is less than one million dollars. Interest earned on money in the fund shall be deposited in the tobacco settlement interest fund created in section 2 of this Act. The fund shall be invested according to § § 4-5-23 and 4-5-26. Section 2. The tobacco settlement interest fund is established according to § 4-4-4. Interest earned on money in the fund shall be credited to the tobacco settlement interest fund. The tobacco settlement interest fund is to be used at the discretion of the Legislature. The fund shall be invested according to § § 4-5-23 and 4-5-26. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
